document.full_text: gunmen dressed in police uniforms and suicide vests stormed the provincial council office in the northern city of tikrit in a brazen attack that killed dozens, officials said.
document.title: iraqi hostages die in attack on leadership of province
lines_and_colors: gunmen dressed in police uniforms and suicide vests stormed the provincial council office in the northern city of tikrit in a brazen attack that killed dozens, officials said.
